readable.title: 2043520315_4a2c782c90
readable.content: A group of hikers led by a black and white dog climbs a hillside trail covered in ferns . A group of three people and one dog hike up a green mountainside . People with a dog hike up a green mountain . Three hikers and a dog are walking through the foliage on the hillside . Three people hiking up a mountain with a river and other mountains in the background .
